src:
Marc Marquez: 2019 Sempurna bagi Honda dan Keluarga Saya
06 Nov 2019, 10:10 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Pebalap Repsol Honda, Marc Marquez, menyebut bahwa 2019 merupakan tahun yang sempurna baik bagi dirinya sendiri, bagi tim, maupun bagi keluarganya. Hal ini ia nyatakan kepada reporter BT Sport, Suzi Perry, dalam presentasi Honda di gelaran EICMA, Milan, Italia, pada Selasa (5/11/2019).
Musim ini, Marquez selalu naik podium, hanya sekali gagal finis akibat terjatuh saat memimpin balapan di MotoGP Austin. Ia meraih 11 kemenangan, dan menyabet gelar dunia pebalap, dan membantu Honda mengunci gelar dunia konstruktor. Sedikit lagi, ia akan membantu Repsol Honda menyabet gelar dunia tim.
Tahun 2019 tak hanya sempurna bagi lingkup Honda, melainkan juga bagi Keluarga Marquez. Adik Marquez, Alex Marquez, juga sukses mengunci gelar dunia Moto2 2019 di Sepang, Malaysia, akhir pekan lalu. Ini adalah kedua kalinya, setelah 2014, Marquez Bersaudara meraih gelar dunia pada tahun yang sama.
text:
Marc Marquez: 2019 Perfect for Honda and My Family
Nov 6 2019, 10:10 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Repsol Honda rider Marc Marquez said that 2019 was a perfect year both for himself, the team and his family. This he stated to BT Sport reporter, Suzi Perry, in a Honda presentation at the EICMA event, Milan, Italy, on Tuesday (5/11/2019).
This season, Marquez has always been on the podium, only once failed to finish due to falling while leading the race in Austin MotoGP. He won 11 victories, and won the driver's world title, and helped Honda lock in the constructor's world title. A little more, he will help Repsol Honda win the team's world title.
2019 is not only perfect for the Honda sphere, but also for the Marquez Family. Marquez's younger brother, Alex Marquez, also successfully locked the Moto2 2019 world title in Sepang, Malaysia, last weekend. This is the second time, after 2014, the Marquez Brothers won the world title the same year.
